entry.title: English Grammar Errors
entry.content:
词汇语法error

It was ___ of Tom not to turn on the radio while I was having a rest.

​ A) considered B) considerate C) considerable D) considering

It was + adj. + of

considerate考虑周到的；considerable相当大的，相当多的。A、D两项的形式均不符合要求

Alice says she is very_____ on photography.

​ A) like B) prefer C) fond D) keen

be keen on：热衷于 be fond of 喜爱 be keen to：渴望

Your hair needs______.

​ A) cutting B) cut C) being cut D) to cut

need doing=need to be done表示被动,need,want,require（要求,需要）,deserve(应得,值得),be worth值得）,not bear(经不住) 后面接doing主动表被动

It was in the zoo______ the artist met the girl, who became his wife later.

​ A) where B) which C) that D) who

非定语从句仅连接，后半句为定语从句

By the time the course ends, we______ a lot of new words and expressions.

​ A) will learn B) have learned C) will have learned D) would have learned

by the time表示将来的时间.主句用将来完成时,而从句用一般现在时来表示将来的动作 表示过去的时间.主句用过去完成时,而从句用一般过去时.

BDACC

The workers found_____ difficult to answer the question.

​ A) what B) it C) that D) this

后者it为形式宾语,difficult为宾补,不定式to answer the question为真正的宾语,整个句子为简单句.

________, Gerald would have been a rich man.

A) Had he entered business B) Were he entered business C) Was he to enter business D) If he entered business

省略if的虚拟语气要使用倒装

Not only ______ the book, but he remembered what he had read.
　A. he had read　　　　B. he read　　　　C. he did read　　　　D. did he read

also被省略，且使用部分倒装

I intended to have my daughters _____ in England.
　A. educate　　　　B. to educate　　　　C. educating　　　　D. educated

“ have + sth （宾语）+ 过去分词（宾语补足语）”意为“让 / 叫 / 使 / 请别人做某事”，宾语sth 后面用过去分词作宾语补足语，说明sth 与过去分词表示的动作之间是被动关系。

The military life agreed _____ Marcel.
　A. to　　　　B. on　　　　C. in　　　　D. with

agree with 赞同，适合于

agree to 答应

BADAD

The good chance the child had looked forward to _______ at last.

​ A. coming B. comes C. come D. came

the child had looked forward to 是定语，修饰the chance ，整句话的基本结构就是The good chance came at last.

There are three reading-rooms in our new library, _________about four hundred students in all.

A. seating B. sit C. seated D. sitting

现在分词表示主动语态

It must have rained last light, ________ the ground is wet here and there.

A. because B. as C. for D. since

for是并列连词，表示推理的理由，because表示解释为什么，since既然，是说话双方都知道的理由，now that既然，是说话双方都知道的理由

They won’t go back to work unless their demands are _________.

A. met B. permitted C. given D. replied

meet one"s demands(needs),满足某人的需要

__________ arriving in Tibet, the soldiers at once joined them __________ their work.

A. At…with B. On…in C. For…with D. After…to

join in 加入

DACAB

----Who told you about Dad’s illness?

----The doctor in ________.

A. connection B. turn C. public D. charge

in charge 负责管理，句意：谁告诉你父亲生病了?是对父亲负责的医生

I’ve got to _________ up now. Someone is waiting to use the phone.

A. give B. put C. look D. hang

hang up 挂断（电话）

The area is _________ Wales.

A. twice big as B. twice the size of C. twice the length of D. twice as long

1.用形容词表示甲是乙的几倍时,用下面三个句型,用副词表示则一般只用前两个句型.
（1）……倍数+形容词（或副词）的比较级+than
This rope is twice longer than that one．这根绳的长度是那根绳的三倍.（比那根绳长二倍）
This hall is five times bigger than our classroom．这个大厅比我们的教室大五倍.（是我们教室的六倍）
The car runs twice faster than that truck．这辆小车的速度比那辆卡车快两倍.（是那辆卡车的三倍）
（2）……倍数+as+形容词（或 much）或副词+as
Asia is four times as large as Europe．亚洲的面积是欧洲的四倍.
This big stone is three times as heavy as that one．这块大石头的重量是那一块的三倍.（这块石头比那块重二倍）
The plane flew ten times as high as the kite．那架飞机飞行高度是那个风筝的十倍.（高出九倍）
（3）……倍数+the size（length,height…）of
This street is four times the length of that street．这条街是那条街的四倍长.
This hill is four times the height of that small one．这座山的高度是那座小山的四倍.（比那座小山高三倍）
也可用：The height of this hill is four times that of that small one．
2.要用名词表示“量”的倍数时,则用以下两个句型：
（1）……倍数+more+名词（可数,不可数）+than
There are four times more books in our library than in yours．我们图书馆藏书（数量）是你们图书馆藏书的四倍.（我们图书馆藏书
比你们的多三倍.）
We have produced twice more grain this year than we did last year．我们今年生产的粮食比去年增长一倍.（是去年的两倍）
（2）……倍数+as many（或much）+名词+其他+as…
After the technique was introduced,the factory produced twice as many tractors in 1988 as the year before．采用新的技术以后
,那个工厂1988年生产的拖拉机是前一年（1987年）的两倍.（比前一年增长一倍）
There is three times as much water in this pot as in that one．这个壶里的水（量）是那个壶里的三倍.

We can come to the ______ that the more we practice，the more skillful we will be.

​ A. tradition B. generation C. conclusion D. fact

come to the conclusion 得出结论

I wished it ______ but it did.

​ A. had not occurred B. occurred not C. did not occur D. would not occur

本题考查的是虚拟语气的用法，表示的是与过去相反的情况，要用过去完成时

DDBCA

I have no choice ______ lay the facts before the public exactly as they occurred.

​ A. but to B. and to C. with to D. only to

have no choice but to do sth 别无选择只能做某事

______ a little earlier，I would have caught the train.

​ A. Did I leave B. Would I leave C. Had I left D. Have I left

if引导的虚拟条件句，省略了if要把had提前

I have no objection ______ for a hike on the mountains with Cynthia.

​ A. to go B. going C. to going D. of going

have no objection to doing sth 不反对做某事

The manager would rather his daughter ______ in the same company.

​ A. would not work B. will not work C. does not work D. did not work

本题考查的是would rather引导的虚拟语气的用法，是对现在的虚拟，所以要用一般过去时

I like _______ history; by studying it , I can gain ______ knowledge of the past events.

A. /,a B. /,/ C. the, a D. a, the

a knowledge of 某种……的知识

ACCDA

Having made up his mind, he _________ to carry out his plan.

A. set about B. set off C. set up D. set out

set out to do/set about doing 着手做某事

The girl seldom, if ________, turned to her brother for protection.

A. never B. ever C. then D. always

if ever很少，难得

As a writer, he succeeded in calling _________ to many of the terrible wrongs that existed at that time.

A. interest B. notice C. attention D. mind

call/pay attention to 注意，重视

It was freezing cold. I put on my overcoat, but it didn’t seem to _________ .

A. help B. heat C. make D. warm

主语为it，因此是它没有起到作用而不是它没有感到暖和

It is quite warm these days ________ November.

A. at B. on C. with D. for

句中for表示“对于”。句意：就十一月份的这些天来说, 天气相当暖和了

DBCAD

The size of this kind of shoes is larger than ________ .

A. my feet B. my shoes C. that of my feet D. that kind of shoes

前半句The size of this kind of shoes可以看出来比较的是鞋的size，不是鞋，也不是脚，所以后边应该也是size of my feet，由于重复用that代替size

The car ________ on the way and we had to walk.

A. broke down B. broke up C. broke out D. broke away

They disagreed with one another and the meeting _________ without any result.

A. broke down B. broke up C. broke out D. broke away

Our school will _________ at the end of June and the students are ready to leave.

A. break into B. break away C. break forth D. break up

break down 打碎，损坏，分解

break up 结束，分手

break out 爆发

break away 放弃，逃跑

break into 破门而入

He studied very hard and in the end turned _________ .

A. scientist B. a scientist C. the scientist D. out a scientist

作连系动词时后接表语名词，省略冠词，如果turn后加into则须在名词前加冠词a

CABDA

They move to another house to make _________ the new comers.

A. a room for B. some room to C. room for D. rooms for

make room/space for 给...让出空地方

Poisons should be kept out of the __________ of children.

A. reach B. catch C. grasp D. hold

keep sth. out of the reach of sb.把某物放在某人够不着的地方

While playing in the garden, _________ .

A. a stone hit me B. a stone fell down upon my shoulder

C. my leg was heavily hit by a stone D. I was hit by a stone

play in the garden 的主语是I ，要前后一致

-------David has made great progress recently.

------- __________ , and _________ .

A. So he has …so you have B. So he has … so have you

C. So has he … so have you D. So has he … so you have

so ＋主语＋系动词（助动词或情态动词）此句型的主语与前一句的主语相同，因而主谓不倒装，so＋系动词（助动词或情态动词）＋另一主语 此句型是主谓倒装结构，表示前句所述肯定情况也适用于另一主语。其中so作“也这样；也如此”解。此时要注意：so后的系动词、助动词或情态动词须同前一句的谓语动词保持一致。so用于肯定句，否定句则用neither

__________ all her efforts, she failed to reach her aim.

A. Together with B. In spite of C. Instead of D. Because of

in spite of 尽管

CADBB

--------Is __________ here?

--------No, Bob and Tom have asked for leave.

A. anybody B. somebody C. everybody D. nobody

通过答句可知这一句不是问“这儿有人吗 ”而是问“人到齐了吗 ”

A dozen years ________ , but the pretty woman remains __________ .

A. passed, the same B. has gone by, unchanged

C. passed by, unchanging D. went by, like before

很多年过去了因此使用完成时

Huck _______ me staying there a little longer.

A. remained B. kept on C. insisted on D. stuck to

insist on 坚持，强调，坚决要求

stick to：坚持,遵守,（自己意愿,主动认为要做的）

Don’t get ________ to the dog. It is dangerous.

A. closely B. nearly C. nearby D. close

get close to 接近; 附; 迫临

Let’s cut the apple __________ and share it.

A. into half B. by half C. into halves D. in halves

此句的意思是：让我们切开这个苹果并分享它，主语为我们因此切苹果的至少为两人，因为还要分享给其他人因此不止切成两份，因此half变为复数halves

CBCDC

When you do fine, close work, such as reading or drawing, raise your eyes __________ and look into the distance.

A. once for a while B. once in a while C. once at a while D. once of a while

once (in) a while：偶尔,有时

The boy stared at his book, ___________ .

A. with pen in hand B. a pen in hand C. pen in his hand D. pen in hand

如果独立主格结构为“名词 + 介宾（介词 + 名词）”，且前后两个名词都是单数时，则在这两个名词前面都无需加任何修饰词

Look, __________ !

A. here the bus comes B. here comes the bus

C. here is the bus coming D. here the bus is coming

never, seldom, rarely, little, hardly, scarcely, no sooner, no longer, nowhere 等含有否定意义的副词若位于句首，则其后要用部分倒装： I shall never forgive him. / Never shall I forgive him. Here，There，Now，Then等副词放在句首时，其后用完全倒装形式,倒装句中主语如为人称代词，应放在动词前面:Here you are.

He has no interests, _________ his work.

A. apart from B. beside C. besides D. accept

apart from 除了,它相当于except/but

Our teacher gives lessons in ___________ .

A. compositions B. composition C. the composition D. a composition

in composition 表示在作文方面；此处composition为不可数名词,表示“写作”.而the表示特指,这里只是虚指.

BDBAB

It was about 600 years ago ________ the first clock with a face and an hour hand was made.

A. that B. when C. before D. until

该句为强调句，强调句的特点是去掉It was ……that……以后句子结构完成

He has been here for __________ .

A. two and a half month B. two and half a month

C. two and the half months D. two and a half months

两个半小时 two and a half hours 半个小时 half an hour

Your advice that she _________ more exercise is reasonable.

A. takes B. take C. does D. carries out

“无条件”虚拟语气句，
原句是：Your advice that she should wait till next week is reasonable.
这里省略should，但只是省略，动词保持原形

___________ of the students in our class are from the north.

A. Two nineth B. Two ninth C. Two ninths D. Two nineths

分数的表达：分子用基数词，分母用序数词，分子大于1，分母用复数

I wasn’t _________ the decision until too late.

A. informed B. formed C. informed of D. informed for

inform sb. of sth. 是固定搭配，意思是：通知某人某事

ADBCC

I demand that one of you ________ there at once.

A. will go B. go C. must go D. has to go

当句中含有suggest，order，wish，demand等表示建议、命令、希望、要求等含义的动词时，后面that从句的谓语动词要用虚拟语气“(should+)动词原形”

His sitting room is lined with all kinds of books, __________ he has ever read.

A. none of B. of which C. none D. none of which

none of one he has ever read，one被which所替代作为定语从句

The number of registered participants in this year’s marathon was only half __________ .

A. of last year’s B. those of last year’s C. of those last year D. that of last year’s

half后完整的应该是half of the number，为了避免重复可用单数指示代词that

The launching of China’s first manned-spaceship was televised ________ by CCTV.

A. alive B. live C. life D. lively

  • v.住；居住；生存；过日子
  • adj. 活的；现场直播的；实况转播的；现场演出的
  • adv.在现场直播；在现场表演（或录制）

It was _________ Christmas Eve that he came back to his home town.

A. till B. until C. because D. not until

until是till的强调形式，但是它们表达的意义是相同的，都表示"直到某时"，until可用于句首，而till通常不用于句首

not until 直到...才... not until …的结构放在句首，那么主句要写成倒装句

BDDBD

He’s far ________ of the others in mathematics.

A. advanced B. forward C. progressive D. ahead

be ahead of“在……前面”

________ the salary meets my expectation, I will accept the job offered.

A. Due to B. Even if C. Unless D. Provided that

provided that 是if one is provided that 的简化，意为假如，假设

________ of books on how to prepare for the entrance examination are compiled by him.

A. The number B. The amount C. A number D. A great deal

a number of 许多，后面动词用复数，the number of ...的数量，后面动词用单数

The two passengers, as well as the driver, __________ in the traffic accident.

A. were injured B. was wounded C. was harmed D. were damaged

as well as常用来连接两个并列的成分，作“也，还”解。它强调的是前一项，后一项只是顺便提及。因此连接并列主语时，谓语动词与前一项一致；而用not only ...but also...连接时，谓语动词与后一项一致。如： Your wife as well as you is friendly to me. 不仅你而且你的妻子也对我很友好（＝Not only you but also your wife is friendly to me）

He stood waving until the train was out of .

A. scene B. sight C. glimpse D. reach

out of sight 在看不见的地方

DDCAB

The newspapers reported yesterday several on the boundaries of these two countries.

A. incidents B. happenings C. events D. accidents

incident 指事件,并特别指国际间或敌对力量等之间的敌对行动,军事冲突.这个句子里面表示两国边境冲突，event 意思是事情,尤指体育运动的比赛项目

Some of the students in his class seem to do their assignments.

A. boring B. interesting C. tiring D. unwilling

“be willing to do something”“乐意干某事”

At the beginning of this term, our English teacher a list of books for us to read.

A. turned out B. made out C. handed in D. passed on

make out of a list 开列清单

This is much to the one I bought last week.

A. worse B. lower C. inferior D. equal

be inferior to 固定搭配,"不如....;比...差劲"

No one could explain how it had__________ that he survived the air crash.

A. become B. arrived C. resulted D. come about

come about 发生

ADBCD

Even a mighty express train can be__________ by signals.

A. slowed up B. held up C. prevented D. kept up

slow up 使慢下来 hold up 举起,提出,阻挡 keep up保持, 继续

Microcomputers__________ with the invention of microchips.

A. appeared B. turned up C. came into being D. were realized

come into being 产生、形成 turn up = show up = appear 现身

He chose a tie which would__________ his suit.

A. suit B. go with C. fit D. agree

go with = match 搭配

Jack denied__________ Mary's little lamb.

A. to steal B. to have stolen C. having to steal D. stealing

deny doing sth = deny having done sth 否认做了某事

How much would you__________ me for repairing my bike?

A. pay B. take C. cost D. charge

charge用作不及物动词时,常接for表示“收…的费”,接down表示“冲锋

BCBDD

You won't be seeing Jane any more. The boss fired her. She's gone__________

A. for all B. for good C. for the time D. for days

for good 永远；永久地，一劳永逸地

He failed knowledge.

A. for want of B. in want of C. for the want of D. in the want of

for want of 因缺乏，由于... 不足

Robert narrowly escaped being arrested robbery.

A. taking charge of B. on charge of C. in charge of D. under the charge of

on charge of 被指控

The workers are paid _______.

A. by an hour B. by the hour C. by hours D. by hour

by the hour 按照小时收费

______ found four-leaf clover is considered a lucky sign.

A. Rarely B. It’s rarely C. The rarely D. Despite its being rarely

主语clover有rarely found four-leaf作为修饰，表示特指，所以前面要加定冠词the

BABBC

This is the first time he _______ out with her alone.

A. had been B. is C. has been D. was

It is first time that sb. have done sth. 某人第一次做某事

If law and order _______ not preserved, neither the citizen nor her property is safe.

A. is B. was C. are D. were

当and连接的并列主语在含义上指同一人、同一物、同一概念时，谓语动词用单数形式。law与order指同一概念，谓语动词用单数

The linebacker and captain of the team _______ most valuable player.

A. have been selected B. have selected C. has been selected D. has selected

同上

More than one best authority on science fiction _______ James Newman a science-fiction writer.

A. does not consider B. do consider C. do not consider D. consider

more than one +单数名词 作主语时, 尽管从意义上看是复数, 谓语动词用单数

more than one +数词＋复数名词 作主语时,谓语动词用复数

John’s father, along with his two uncles, _______ in New York one more day.

A. demand that he stay B. demands that he stays

C. demands that he stay D. demand that he stays

demand后跟虚拟语气的should+v.原型，should常省略

CACAC

The criteria for promotion ______ clearly stated.

A. has B. have C. is D. are

criteria是criterion的复数，意为标准，条件，晋升的标准成熟的很清楚了.这里的陈述,声明state为被动

It is said that most of the film we are going to see ______ the organized bank robbery.

A. describes B. describe C. has described D. described

film为不可数名词，most of the +不可数名词/可数名词单数，谓语动词要用单数形式

The museum _______ the public every day.

A. opens B. is being opened C. is opened D. is open to

be open to 对…开放；愿接受…的

There was nothing they could do _______.

A. but wait B. except waiting C. only to wait D. unless they waited

考查固定短语be nothing but。当but做除了的意思讲的时候，要遵循“有do无to，无do加to”的原则， but前出现了do,but后的to就要省略

When you were talking to the policeman, I saw a teenager ______.

A. getting on your car and driving off B. get on your car and driving off

C. getting on your car and drive off D. get on your car and drive off

see sb doing：看见某人正在在做什么。

see sb do：看见某人做了某事。

DADAD

Mary is a turner. She spent years in a factory _______.

A. to be trained B. training C. for being trained D. being trained

train当培养的意思的时候有被动，当训练的时候无被动

感官性动词 feel ， look ， smell ， sound ， taste 等无被动形式，要用主动形式表示被动意义

一些常见的动词如 cut ， drive ， drink ， keep ， number ， open ， pay ， prove ， read ， sell ， wash ， wear ， weigh ， write 常用主动形式表示被动意义

He had no alternative but _______ to see him.

A. go B. went C. going D. to go

have no alternative but to do 别无选择做某事

The student expected there ______ more reviewing classes before the final exams.

A. is B. being C. have been D. to be

expect sth to do

I saw _______ waiting in line applying for the only position.

A. a lot of unemployment B. unemployments

C. a lot of unemployed D. a lot of unemployee

the unemployed 失业者

_______ is often the case in nature, the common things are the most complicated.

A. That B. It C. As D. What

as is often the case 正如平常那样

BDDCC

A deadlock was reached in the discussion as neither side would give away to _______.

A. any other B. the other C. another D. other

三者或三者以上中的另一个，用another

一定范围内或两个人(物)中，特指剩下的“另一个”用the other

What could I do then except _______ you away.

A. to watch them to carry B. watching them carry

C. watch them to carry D. watch them carry

expect sb to do/do sth

She never doubted for a moment _______ she was right.

A. whether B. that C. why D. if

她从不怀疑自己因此不会是是否

I don’t travel much. I have never been to _______ Detroit.

A. a city other than B. a city than C. a city another than D. another city than

another是三者或三者以上的另一个 other是其他的意思

All things _______, the result is satisfactory.

A. considered B. considering C. to consider D. are considered

过去分词作定语表示被动的发生过的动作

BDBAA

If you don’t want to go with me, you ______ stay at home.

A. may well B. may as well as C. may as well D. may just well

may/might as well构成习惯搭配，意为“倒不妨……”

_______ do we go for picnic.

A. Certainly B. Once C. Sometimes D. Seldom

否定意义的词置于句首倒装，seldom 很少

The Mets ended their season on Tuesday as _______.

A. the Yankees did B. did the Yankees

A. the Yankees do B. do the Yankees

同上

Often _______ not to touch the poisonous chemical.

A. does Fort warn us B. Fort warn us

C. Fort warns us D. Has Fort warned us

often表示经常的动作，用一般现在时并可省略

_______ can we create or destroy energy.

A. By no means B. Either C. Neither D. Hardly

By no means 绝不

CDBAA

_______ little we may like it, old age comes to most of us.

A. So B. How C. However D. Despite

however+形容词/副词

The chief hid himself in the chimney _______ someone should catch him in the catch.

A. but that B. where C. lest D. so that

lest引起的目的状语从句，从句中用了should+动词原形的虚拟语气，表示“唯恐”这一主观意愿

He felt a bit worried, _______ they were not working hard, but that they did not pay enough attention to safety.

A. for B. because C. since D. not that

Not that …but that 意思是 “（这）并不是…而是”，是 it is not that … but that 的省略。两个 that 是由连词but并列的表语从句，第二个 that 可以省略

_______ the fine words he may say to your face, he hates you at heart.

A. For all B. After all C. Even if D. Although

even if 和 although为连词需要跟句子，the fine words为名词因此使用for all(尽管，虽然)

When _______ where he came from, the little boy cried instead of replying.

A. was asked B. asked C. asking D. asking him

过去分词表示被动

CCDAB

The big waves might have drowned the child _______ fast to the saving boat.

A. if he did not hold B. didn’t he hold C. had he held D. hadn’t he held

虚拟语气，if被省略使用倒装

The speed _______ light travels is said to be the maximum in the universe.

A. at which B in which C. by which D. from which

at the speed 是固定搭配表示以.....的速度

Do you think the reason _______ he gave is believable?

A. for which B. which C. what D. to which

先行词为the reason，从句中he gave 后缺少宾语，所以应使用关系代词which/that

_______ radar is to airplanes and ships, ______ eyes are to human’s body.

A. Such…as B. Just…as C. Such as …so D. Just as…so

just as..., so... 正如...一样，...也...

The fog _____ dense, all the ferry boats were suspended.

A. is B. being C. having been D. was

状语从句改为伴随状语，原句为The fog was dense,因此将谓语变为现在分词的形态

CABDB

She said she wouldn’t call us the next day, ____she?

A. would B. wouldn’t C. did D. didn’t

主句动词是said，反意疑问部分应该用didn't

Western Nebraska generally receives less snow than _____ eastern Nebraska.

A. does B. in C. it does in D. in it does

does替代的是receives snow，其逻辑主语是Eastern Nebraska，由于does较简短，而Eastern Nebraska较长，因而使用了倒装

The winter vacation ____ over, he got down to his work again.

A. was B. were C. had been D. being

伴随状语从句，省略连词Because并将动词改为进行时

All flights ____ because of the snowstorm, we decided to take the train instead.

A. were canceled B. having canceled C. had been canceled D. having been canceled

理由同上

The atmosphere is as much a part of the earth as ____ its soil and the water of its lakes, rivers and oceans.

A. are B. do C. is D. has

as much…as是一固定结构，意思是“和……一样，正如……”。后一个as引出的是一个主谓倒装的比较从句，根据主句的结构，比较从句中的谓语应为连系动词be，从句中的主语是soils and water，谓语要用复数形式

DADDA

Nobody came to see me while I was out, ____ ?

A. did they B. didn’t they C. did she D. didn’t she

陈述句的主语是no one,none,nobody,nothing等含有否定意义的不定代词时,反意疑问句要用肯定式(但含有否定前后缀的否定词除外)

Not until ____ himself seriously ill.

A. he had completed the task did he find B. had he completed the task did he found

C. he completed the task had he found D. did he completed the task he had found

原句：（He did not find himself seriously ill） until he had completed the task.
Not until表否定,放到句首,until后面的句子仍然跟着until,但引起主句（上面括号里的是主句）部分倒装

It was recommended that passengers ____ smoke during the flight.

A. not B. need not C. could not D. did not

It is +adj. +that +(should)

___ you were busy, I wouldn’t have bothered you with my questions.

A. If I realized B. Had I realized C. I realized that D. As I realized

省略 if的倒装虚拟语气

He resented ____ to wait. He expected the minister ____ him at once.

A. to be asked , to see B. being asked, to see

C. to be asked, seeing D. be asked, seeing

resent doing sth. expect to do sth.

ADABB

The boy came running into the room, ____ .

A. his face was dirty and his clothes torn B. his face dirty and his clothes torn

C. his face was dirty and his clothes were torn D. his face dirty and his clothes were torn

The boy came running into the room,(with) his face dirty and his clothes torn.
后面那个句子表示伴随,形容他的脸很脏还有他的衣服破了.不能有谓语动词

____ in this light, the matter is not as serious as people generally suppose.

A. To see B. Seen C. Seeing D. Being seen

这个是分谓语动词考点过去分词做状语，这个动词的所变的形式取决于主专句的主语。
动词属see的逻辑主语与主句的逻辑主语一致，也就是判别the matter与see之间的关系。
这里seen in this light意思是“从这个角度看”，see与the matter之间是被动关系，所以用过去分词seen。
对比下面一题：
Seeing the matter in this light, we think it is not as serious as people generally suppose.
这个例句里see与主语we是主动关系，所以用Seeing。

In vain ____ to get in touch with the Embassy.

A. they tried B. tried they C. did they try D. they have try

状语in vain置于句首时，句子中的主谓要部分倒装，即将谓语中的be动词或助动词提前

Advertising is distinguished from other forms of the communication ____ the advertiser pays for the message to be delivered.

A. in which B. in that C. in order that D. in the way

容易错选A选项，但此处并非定语从句而是表示原因的in that

There are two small rooms in the beach house, ____ serves as a kitchen.

A. the smaller of which B. the smallest of which

C. the smaller of them D. the smallest of them

非限定定语从句作主语

BBCBA

We’d rather you ____ the account tomorrow.

A. settled B. settle C. would settle D. will settle

would rather后可跟从句,表示主语宁愿让某人干某事.从句谓语动词用虚拟语气,即用一般过去时表示现在或将来要做的事

I regret ____ you that I can’t go to Hangzhou for a visit Sunday with you because I’ve caught a bad cold.

A. to tell B. telling C. tell D. having told

He regrets ____ my advice.

A. not having taken B not take .C. to have not taken D. not to take

动词不定式一般表示事情还没有发生，也就是说 动作还没有做，而动名词常常表示动作已经发生了或者是正在进行，因此：regret doing sth 意思是：后悔曾经做过某事 regret to do sth 为要去做某事而后悔 （还没有做就已经后悔了）

After we made the improvement, there were only ____ as before.

A. one-tenth defective products as many B. one-tenth as many defective products

C. defective products one-tenth as many D. defective products as one-tenth many

one-tenth和many都是限定词，要置于名词词组之前

Henry Food’s introduction of the assembly line vastly reduced the time it took ______ a car.

A. making B. for making C. to make D. while making

it takes/took + 时间 ＋ to do

AAABC

____ , many people still vote against the use of the death penalty.

A. However some crimes are inexcusable

B. However are some crimes inexcusable

C. However inexcusable some crimes are

D. Some crimes are however inexcusable

此处的however是副词而不是连词，根据用法，后应跟形容词或副词

What would happen supposing he ____ here?

A. is B. was C. be D. were

虚拟语气

____ with air, a life jacket will keep a person afloat.

A. It is filled B. Filling C. When filled D. When filling

从属分句省略主语时，其逻辑主语应与主句主语一致，本句的主语应该是a life jacket，所以应选择表被动的filled

But for the traffic jam, we ___ earlier.

A. should arrive B. should have arrived C. shall arrive D. shall have arrived

but for 要不是 用于虚拟语气，主句应使用现在完成时表示本应做却没做

When you have finished with that video tape, don’t forget to put it in my drawer, ____ ?

A. do you B. will you C. don’t you D. won’t you

前面是否定祈使句时，反意问句中的助动词通常用will

Come here a moment, ____?

A. shall you B. do you C. don’t you D. will you

CDCBBD

The three men tried many times to sneak across the border into the neighbouring country, ____ by the police each time.

A. had been captured B. being always captured

C. only to be captured D. unfortunately captured

only to be 反而，结果却，不料。前后两分句之间为转折关系，必须用only to be的结构来凸显此意

You must be hungry, ____?

A. aren’t you B. must you C. mustn’t you D. are you

当must表示猜测时候,谓语动词用后面的

You’d better come tomorrow, ___ ?

A. didn’t you B. couldn’t you C. shouldn’t you D. hadn’t you

you'd better 是 you had better 的缩写

Let’s put an end to it, ____?

A. will you B. shall you C. will we D. shall we

let's ：理解为：我们做……怎么样？ 反意疑问句用 shall we

let us ：理解为：让我们做……吧，反意疑问句用 will you

No one is interested in that, ____?

A. is he B. isn’t he C. aren’t they D. are they

当陈述句中的主语为anybody，anyone，everybody，everyone，somebody，someone，nobody，no one，these，those等时，反意疑问句中的主语用they

CADDD

I’m late, ____?

A. am not I B. am I C. is I D. aren’t I

I am常常用aren't来反问

_ has ever happened.

A. No such a thing B. No such thing C .Such no thing D. No such things

no such thing 固定搭配 There is no such thing as a free lunch.天下没有免费的午餐

It is not _____ to see that your pupils study their lessons.

A. your whole business B. whole your business

C. your all business D. all of your whole business

whole一般位于冠词、所有格或别的限定词之后,而all须位于这些词之前.all the time;the whole time 整个时间

Half the joke is the exaggeration; ______ is that this is not exaggeration at all.

A. the other joke B. the other half C. another half D. the rest

the other加复数名词指的是一定范围内“所有其余的人或事物”，是特指；而other加复数名词却是没有明确范围的“另外的人或事物”,The other表示“两个数量中的另一个”，another表示“总数为三个以上中任意的另一个”

When I try to understand ______that prevents so many Americans from being as happy
as one might expect, it seems to me that there are two causes.
A. why it does B. what it does C. what it is D. why it is

强调句型，其结构是：It was+被强调部分+that/who（人）+其他。判断强调句型的方法是把It was that这三个词去掉，整个句子不缺成分，意思完整。这里被强调的是疑问词what，因为是宾语从句，所以强调句型应该用陈述语序，what在从句中做主语，why不能做主语

DDABC

Their room was on the third floor, its window _______ the sports ground.
A. overlooks B. overlooking C. overlooked D. to overlook

分词的独立主格结构，window与overlook的关系是主动的，故要用现在分词

On no account _______ to anyone who works in the company.
A. my name must be mentioned B. my name must mention
C. must my name be mentioned D. must my name mention

英语中的句子如果句首被带有否定词的状语所修饰，句子要倒装。否定词除了常见的no，never，not还包括一些半否定词如：little，few，seldom，hardly，barely，rarely等

Beethoven is my favorite musician. I regard him as ____ other musicians.

A. superior to B. superior than C. more superior to D. more superior than

英语中有少数形容词比较级不用连词than。这类形容词有 superior(优于)，inferior(低于)，senior(年长于)，junior(年幼于)等，他们后面接to，而不是than

_____ tomorrow, he would be able to see the opening ceremony.

Would he come B. If he comes C. Was he coming D. Were he to come

省略if的将来虚拟语气倒装，将来虚拟语气只能使用were to/should,且当从句使用were to是主句只能使用过去时

The room is quite clean, it _____.

A. doesn’t need to cleaning B. needn’t to cleaning

C. doesn’t need cleaning D. needn’t cleaning

这句中的need是实意动词,是“需要”的意思,否定形式是助动词do+not+need原型

BCBDC

You don’t have to come in such a hurry. I’m busy now, and I would rather you _______ here tomorrow.

A. would come B. will come

C. came D. have come

would rather(宁愿)后跟从句时，从句用虚拟语气，谓语动词用过去式形式，表示与现在事实相反,错综虚拟语气注意tomorrow

There are two major problems linked with atomic power plants, the first （）concerns nuclear waste.

A. of which B. of the two

C. of them D. of the plants

A前后两句逗号相连，都出现谓语动词，因此我们可以断定两句一定是主从句形式，后半句为非限定性定语从句，用介词+which引导

The factory produced many famous cars, none of shipped to foreign countries.

A. them B. which C. it D. what

本题容易误选 B。容易被认为是一个非限制性定语从句。理由是 none 后面 没有并列连词 and, but。但是，ship 在这里是一个及物动词，意思为“运送……到”，也就 是说这里的 shipped 是一个过去分词，后面的部分是一个独立主格结构。如果在 shipped 前 面加一个 was，则应该选 B，构成非限制性定语从句

The manager decided to give the job to he believed had a strong sense of duty.

A. whoever B. whomever C. who D. those

作宾语从句的主语；he believed 可视为插入语

​ to speak when the audience interrupted him. A. Hardly had he begun B. No sooner had he begun

C. Not until he began D. Scarcely did he begin

hardly...when...是固定句型。no sooner...than...与它是同义词，都是一...就...的意思。且如果否定词在句首，要用倒装

CAAAA

换行标签

<a href="cal:176xxxx5519">点击此处便会跳转打电话</a>

entry.title: Python1.0
entry.content:
#号为注释

# this is a comment text

多行注释''' '''

'''
这是一行注释
这也是一行注释
'''

IDLE为Python的交互式界面也叫做shell界面

交互式-- 一问一答的解释性语言（一行一行的执行）

print(你需要输出的语句)

>>>print("This is my first experience to study python language")
This is my first experience to study python language
>>>print(1+2)
3

print("www","baidu","com",sep=".")  #以.作为连接符，输出：www.bai.com
print("hello",end="")      #end 以什么结束，若为空则不换行连接输出
print("world",end="\t")   #该语句输出：helloworld    python
print("python")

*用在字符串里表示重复操作符

>>>print("fuck"*3)
fuckfuckfuck

input()输入函数

>>>t=input("test")
>>>print(t)
test

input输入的均为字符串，若想输入其他形式则先强制进行转换

>>>x=int(input("123"))
>>>print(x)
123

>>>a=1
>>>type(a)  #输出a的数据类型
>>><class 'int'>    #class为未定义数据

输出文字信息的同时需要引入数据，则使用格式化操作符%

>>>name="Briz"
>>>print("my name is %s"%name)
>>>my name is Briz

if条件语句:两个数比大小

num1=int(input("Input a digital:"))
num2=int(input("Input another digital:"))
if num1==num2:
    print("euqal!")
elif num1>num2:

模块 module：一般情况下，是一个以.py为后缀的文件。 module 可看作一个工具类，可共用或者隐藏代码细节，将相关代码放置在一个module以便让代码更 好用、易懂，让coder重点放在高层逻辑上。 module能定义函数、类、变量，也能包含可执行的代码。module来源有3种： ①Python内置的模块（标准库）； ②第三方模块； ③自定义模块。

包 package： 为避免模块名冲突，Python引入了按目录组织模块的方法，称之为 包（package）。包 是含有Python模块的文件夹。

urllib模块

是最基本的python内置的一个http请求库，不需要额外的安装。只需要关注请求的链接，参数，提供了强大的解析功能

urllb.request 请求模块

urllib.error 异常处理模块

urllib.parse 解析模块

简单的一个get请求

BeautifulSoup模块

Beautiful Soup 是一个HTML/XML的解析器，主要的功能是如何解析和提取 HTML/XML 数据。

BeautifulSoup支持Python标准库中的HTML解析器,还支持一些第三方的解析器，如果我们不安装它， 则 Python 会使用 Python默认的解析器，lxml 解析器更加强大，速度更快，推荐使用lxml 解析器。 Beautiful Soup自动将输入文档转换为Unicode编码，输出文档转换为utf-8编码。你不需要考虑编码方 式，除非文档没有指定一个编码方式，这时，Beautiful Soup就不能自动识别编码方式了。然后，你仅仅需要说明一下原始编码方式就可以了。

创建BeautifulSoup4对象

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
file = open('./aa.html', 'rb')
html = file.read()
bs = BeautifulSoup(html,"html.parser") # 缩进格式

BeautifulSoup4四大对象种类

BeautifulSoup4将复杂HTML文档转换成一个复杂的树形结构,每个节点都是Python对象,所有对象可以 归纳为4种:

Tag

NavigableString

BeautifulSoup

Comment

Tag

Tag通俗点讲就是HTML中的一个个标签，例如：

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
file = open('./aa.html', 'rb')
html = file.read()
bs = BeautifulSoup(html,"html.parser")

print(bs.title)# 获取title标签的所有内容

print(bs.head)# 获取head标签的所有内容

print(bs.a)# 获取第一个a标签的所有内容

print(type(bs.a))# 类型

我们可以利用 soup 加标签名轻松地获取这些标签的内容，这些对象的类型是bs4.element.Tag。但是，它查找的是在所有内容中的第一个符合要求的标签(不包括被注释的)。

对于 Tag，它有两个重要的属性，是 name 和 attrs：

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
file = open('./aa.html', 'rb')
html = file.read()
bs = BeautifulSoup(html,"html.parser")

print(bs.name)# [document] #bs 对象本身比较特殊，它的 name 即为 [document]

print(bs.head.name)# head #对于其他内部标签，输出的值便为标签本身的名称

print(bs.a.attrs)# 把 a 标签的所有属性打印输出了出来，得到的类型是一个字典。

print(bs.a['class']) # 等价 bs.a.get('class')

bs.a['class'] = "newClass"# 可以对这些属性和内容等等进行修改

del bs.a['class']# 对这个属性进行删除

遍历文档树

5.1 .contents：获取Tag的所有子节点，返回一个list

# tag的.content 属性可以将tag的子节点以列表的方式输出
print(bs.head.contents)
# 用列表索引来获取它的某一个元素
print(bs.head.contents[1])

5.2 .children：获取Tag的所有子节点，返回一个生成器

for child in bs.body.children:
print(child)

5.3、.descendants：获取Tag的所有子孙节点

5.4、.strings：如果Tag包含多个字符串，即在子孙节点中有内容，可以用此获取，而后进行遍历

5.5、.stripped_strings：与strings用法一致，只不过可以去除掉那些多余的空白内容

5.6、.parent：获取Tag的父节点

5.7、.parents：递归得到父辈元素的所有节点，返回一个生成器

5.8、.previous_sibling：获取当前Tag的上一个节点，属性通常是字符串或空白，真实结果是当前标签 与上一个标签之间的顿号和换行符

5.9、.next_sibling：获取当前Tag的下一个节点，属性通常是字符串或空白，真是结果是当前标签与下 一个标签之间的顿号与换行符

5.10、.previous_siblings：获取当前Tag的上面所有的兄弟节点，返回一个生成器

5.11、.next_siblings：获取当前Tag的下面所有的兄弟节点，返回一个生成器

5.12、.previous_element：获取解析过程中上一个被解析的对象(字符串或tag)，可能与 previous_sibling相同，但通常是不一样的

5.13、.next_element：获取解析过程中下一个被解析的对象(字符串或tag)，可能与next_sibling相同， 但通常是不一样的

5.14、.previous_elements：返回一个生成器，可以向前访问文档的解析内容

5.15、.next_elements：返回一个生成器，可以向后访问文档的解析内容

5.16、.has_attr：判断Tag是否包含属性

通过text参数可以搜索文档中的字符串内容，与name参数的可选值一样，text参数接受 字符串，正则 表达式，列表

find()

find()将返回符合条件的第一个Tag，有时我们只需要或一个Tag时，我们就可以用到find()方法了。当然 了，也可以使用find_all()方法，传入一个limit=1，然后再取出第一个值也是可以的，不过未免繁琐。

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import re
file = open('./aa.html', 'rb')
html = file.read()
bs = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")
# 返回只有一个结果的列表
t_list = bs.find_all("title",limit=1)
print(t_list)
# 返回唯一值
t = bs.find("title")
print(t)
# 如果没有找到，则返回None
t = bs.find("abc") print(t)
#从结果可以看出find_all，尽管传入了limit=1，但是返回值仍然为一个列表，当我们只需要取一个值时，远不如find方法方便。但是如果未搜索到值时，将返回一个None

re模块

正则表达式常用操作符

操作符 说明 实例
. 表示任何单个字符
[ ] 字符集，对单个字符给予取值范围 [abc]表示a,b,c，[a-z]表示a到z单个字符
[^ ] 非字符集，对单个字符给出取值范围 [^abc]表示非a或b或c的单个字符
* 前一个字符0次或无限次扩展 abc*表示ab,abc,abcc,abccc等
+ 前一个字符1次或无限次扩展 abc+表示abc,abcc,abccc等
？ 前一个字符0次或1次扩展 abc?表示ab,abc
| 左右表达式任意一个 abc|def表示abc,def
{m} 扩展前一个字符m次 ab{2}c表示abbc
{m,n} 扩展前一个字符m至n次（含n） ab{1,3}c表示abc,abbc,abbbc
^ 匹配字符串开头 ^abc表示abc且在一个字符串的开头
$ 匹配字符串结尾 abc$表示abc且在一个字符串的结尾
( ) 分组标记，内部可使用|操作符 (abc)表示abc ,(abc|def)表示abc，def
\d 数字，等价于[0-9]
\w 单词字符，等价于[A-Z]/[a-z]/[0-9]/_ 网站注册用户名(只能使用大小写字母数字和下划线 )

“?” ：0次或1次，match,search 不会出现none，会出现’ ‘ （因为0次也是符合的） 0次或1次不是指[xxx]这个集合，而是其中的任何的一个字符

pat = re.compile( [abc]? )
pat.match( defabc ).group() #0次
pat.match( abcdefabc ).group()
>>> a
pat.search( defabc ).group() #0次
pat.findall( defabc ) #0次和1次
>>> [ , , , a , b , c , ]

“数量词?” ：非贪婪模式：只匹配最少的（尽可能少）；默认贪婪模式：匹配最多的（尽可能多）

pat = re.compile( [abc]+ ) #贪婪模式
>>> pat.match( abcdefabcabc ).group() #匹配尽可能多的：abc
>>> abc
>>> pat.match( bbabcdefabcabc ).group()
>>> bbabc
>>> pat.search( dbbabcdefabcabc ).group()
>>> bbabc
>>> pat.findall( abcdefabcabc )
>>> [ abc , abcabc ]
>>> pat = re.compile( [abc]+? ) #非贪婪模式：+?
>>> pat.match( abcdefabcabc ).group() #匹配尽可能少的：a、b、c
>>> a
>>> pat.search( dbbabcdefabcabc ).group()
>>> b
>>> pat.findall( abcdefabcabc )
>>> [ a , b , c , a , b , c , a , b , c ]

Re库主要功能函数

函数 说明
re.search() 在一个字符串中国搜索匹配正则表达式的第一个位置，返回match对象
re.match() 从一个字符串的开始位置起匹配正则表达式，返回match对象
re.findall() 搜索字符串，以列表类型返回全部能匹配的子串
re.split() 将一个字符串按照正则表达式匹配结果进行分隔，返回列表类型
re.finditer() 搜索字符串，返回一个匹配结果的迭代类型，每个迭代对象是match对象
re.sub() 在一个字符串中替换所有匹配正则表达式的子串，返回替换后的字符串

正则表达式可以包含一些可选标志修饰符来控制匹配的模式。修饰符被指定为一个可选的标志。 多个标志可以通过按位 OR(|) 它们来指定。如 re.I | re.M 被设置成 I 和 M 标志：

修饰符 描述
re.I 使匹配对大小写不敏感
re.L 做本地化识别（locale-aware）匹配
re.M 多行匹配，影响 ^ 和 $
re.S 使 . 匹配包括换行在内的所有字符
re.U 根据Unicode字符集解析字符。这个标志影响 \w, \W, \b, \B.
re.X 该标志通过给予你更灵活的格式以便你将正则表达式写得更易于理解。
函数具体用法
compile(pattern)：创建模式对象
import re
pat=re.compile("A")
#m=pat.search("CBA")
m=pat.search("ABC")
#等价于 re.search( A , CBA )
print(m)
#<re.Match object; span=(2, 3), match='A'> 表示匹配到了
m=pat.search("CBD")
print(m) #None 表示没匹配到
search(pattern,string)：在字符串中寻找模式
import re
m = re.search("asd" , "ASDasd" )
print(m)
# <_sre.SRE_Match object at 0xb72cd6e8> #匹配到了，返回MatchObject（True）
m = re.search("asd" , "ASDASD" )
print(m)     #表示没匹配到返回None(False)
match(pattern,string)：在字符串开始处匹配模式
# 等价于
pat=re.compile( "a" )
print(pat.match( "Aasd" ))
#输出None
print(pat.match("aASD" ))
#输出 <_sre.SRE_Match object at 0xb72cd6e8>
# 上面的函数返回都可以在if条件语句中进行判断：
if pat.search("asd"):
print ("OK") #OK #找到返回
if re.search("a","ASD" ):
print ("OK") #没有找到
split(pattern,string)：根据模式分割字符串,返回列表
re.split( , , a,s,d,asd )

pat.split( a,s,d,asd )

[ a , s , d , asd ]
re.split( [, ]+ , a , s ,d ,,,,,asd ,maxsplit=2) # maxsplit 最多分割次数
[ a , s , d ,,,,,asd ]

pat.split( a , s ,d ,,,,,asd ,maxsplit=2) # maxsplit 最多分割次数
[ a , s , d ,,,,,asd ]

import re
print(re.findall( "a" , "ASDaDFGAa" ))
#[ a , a ] #列表形式返回匹配到的字符串
pat = re.compile( "a" )
print(pat.findall( "ASDaDFGAa" ))
#[ a , a ] #列表形式返回匹配到的字符串
pat = re.compile( "[A-Z]+" ) #正则匹配：[A-Z]+ 前一个字符`1`次或无限次扩展
print(pat.findall( "ASDcDFGAa" ))
#[ ASD , DFGA ] #找到匹配到的字符串

pat.findall( ASDcDFGAa )

pat.findall( ASDcDFGAa )

re.sub( a , A , abcasd ) #找到a用A替换，后面见和group的配合使用
